snippet.title: Blood Typers - Official Gameplay Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Type to kill in Blood Typers, an upcoming survival horror adventure game. Alone or with friends, explore a sprawling cursed film studio as its horror movies bleed into reality. Choose from a roster of characters then plan your escape from this bloody homage to old school horror. But remember... death is just a typo away. Check out the Blood Typers trailer to see the terrifiying creatures you'll fight against using your typing skills and how gameplay works. Blood Typers will be available on PC in February 2025, and a demo is out now on Steam.
